thread.title: Nicola Sturgeon makes pitch for working class voters
thread.title_full: Nicola Sturgeon makes pitch for working class voters - The Scotsman

author: scotsman.com
title: Nicola Sturgeon makes pitch for working class voters
text:
34
Have your say NICOLA Sturgeon yesterday made a dramatic pitch to working class voters as she sought to cement the SNP’s dominance over Labour in Scotland.
The First Minister declared that the SNP was a “left of centre social democratic party” as she announced a series of measures to help those struggling on low incomes.
Closing the largest ever SNP conference with a rapturously received speech, Sturgeon said Labour was going “deeper and deeper into the political wilderness” under Jeremy Corbyn’s leadership.
